text: Ilex illustris is a species of plant in the family Aquifoliaceae. It is endemic to Peninsular Malaysia.Chua, L. S. L. 1998. Ilex illustris. 2012 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 June 2013. ==References== illustris Category:Endemic flora of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Conservation dependent plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ilex illustris
